name: The Root of the Problem
description:
GAME

A/D or LEFT/RIGHT to MOVE

W or UP to JUMP

AIM with MOUSE

LEFT MOUSE or SPACE to SHOOT

 CREDITS

Tim I Hely - Programming

Michelle Zhou - Programming

Fé Mendoza - Programming

Elliot Hely - Art

Eyulia Mendoza - Art

Gabriel “Snazziful” DeGuire - Music

 This game was made in 48 hours for the 2023 Global Game Jam! This year's theme was : Root!
